title.newValue: Microsoft Viva: Changes to Viva Engage Connector for Topic Name

description.newValue: In support of migrating tenants from using legacy Viva Engage topics to Viva Topics, changes are coming to the Power Automate connector for Viva Engage. The topic name parameter will be deprecated from the connector. Legacy flows will continue to work, but the topic name parameter will not be available for new flows.
